Posts.Content: dkelly wrote: I have a lump to the side of my right breast....what they call "out of the breast area".  The doctors can feel it, but nothing showed up on the mammogram or the ultrasound.  It's there, but they can't see it.  I'm having a biopsy done on Monday.  I can't wait.  How can one have a lump, but it can't be seen on the scans? Posts.Title: "Invisible" lump dkelly momster
